content: quote: Originally posted by I_M_Qwerty: quote: That's a rather bizzare conclusion? What if had said, "We want to spend the next eight years litigating the past," what would you say them? Personally, I wish he'd shut up about the last 8 years. Enough already. The election is o-v-e-r. I'd rather see him focus on the remainder of HIS four year term ... Most of us are intelligent enough to know what to blame on Bush and/or others ... and what for which Obama is gradually becoming responsible ... whether we own up to it or not. His redundant attacks on the last administration are a bit demeaning of the office he holds IMHO. I don't think that this is politically possible. Everytime he reverses a Bush Policy, he is attacked for reversing a Bush policy. And to be fair, I say the same for Obama critics. These are after all incredibly polarising times. I will grant him brownie points for making a sincere effort to lower the level of hostility. But you can't ask him to commit political suicide. Dave
